Learning Resource Updates

Below are recent documentation and Brightcove Academy course updates.

Index of all documentation updates

Product Release Notes

If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Documentation Updates document.

7-April-2023

New Brightcove Academy Courses

  • Title: Video Connector Integration
  • Description: In this walkthrough, we will demonstrate the full setup of the Brightcove Video Connector integration in the Shopify e-commerce platform.
  • Customer Link: https://academy.brightcove.com/video-connector-integration
  • Employee Link: https://employee-academy.brightcove.com/video-connector-integration-employees
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Integrations
  • Title: What's New Section
  • Description: See the latest additions to Brightcove Academy's learning offerings.
  • Customer Link: https://academy.brightcove.com
  • Employee Link: https://employee-academy.brightcove.com/page/tool-torials
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: General

New Docs

  • Title: SpringServe Ad Macros with the Native SDKs
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to take advantage of ad monetization when using client-side ad insertion (CSAI) with the Brightcove Native SDKs. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/springserve-with-sdks.html
  • Product: Device SDKs
  • Product Area: Ad monetization

Major updates

  • Title: Using Content Layouts
  • Description: Updated the App Settings screenshots to include the new Channels option
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/layout/using-content-layouts.html
  • Product: Beacon
  • Product Area: Managing Pages & Layouts
  • Title: Player Configuration Guide
  • Description: Added properties download_button and skip_buttons (Player v7.4.0 and above) to the configuration properties list
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/general/player-configuration-guide.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Player Features
  • Title: Sending Brightcove Analytics from the Native SDK for Android
  • Description: Updated text and code snippet for sending account ID
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/analytics/sending-brightcove-analytics-native-sdk-android.html
  • Product: Device SDKs
  • Product Area: Native SDK for Android
  • Title: Creating an SVOD Plan
  • Description: Updated for Evergent SVOD trials - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/monetization/general/creating-svod-plan.html
  • Product: Beacon
  • Product Area: Monetization

Minor updates

  • Title: Brightcove Native SDK for Android Release Notes
  • Description: Added ExoPlayer version to the Android release notes
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/resources/brightcove-native-sdk-android-release-notes.html
